title: Versatile High plat player
body:
IGN: Alüe
Highest Elo: Plat 1
Pref Role: Mid/Adc
Age: 22

Looking to join a serious ranked plat or low diamond team. Versatile player that can fill pratically any role. Prefer mid over adc, but will be willing to fill any role. Contact me in game or with information of how to.

Thanks

replies.body:
Sup Main, not a smurf but add me if you at least want to try out a couple games. Always willing to learn as well.

na.op.gg/summoner/userName=9tt2
